comment: It's generally safe during the day, especially in busy areas. Just gotta be aware of your surroundings.
There are some quiet spots, and it's not bad if you stick to the main roads. Could be better at night though.
It's improved a lot, but you still need to be cautious, especially after dark. Familiarity helps here.
It's bustling, but there are definitely areas you want to avoid, particularly if you're alone.
It's lively and generally okay, but like any big township, it has its challenges and certain spots can be risky.
While some parts are fine, overall it can be quite dodgy, especially outside of business hours. Need to be constantly vigilant.
I found it surprisingly safe, especially the residential areas and main shopping centers. Felt comfortable walking around.
I've heard too many stories and personally feel uneasy there, especially at night. It's best to be extremely careful.
It's developing, but there are still concerns, particularly with petty crime. Be aware, but it's not the worst.
I'm local, and if you know your way around and stick to safe zones, it's actually quite welcoming and secure in those areas.
